tags.name: multiple-choice
tags.description:
`multiple-choice`
`Ask the user a question from a set of possible answers.`

Events:

  * `user-engagement` - 

Attributes:

  * `positionTarget` - 

  * `related-resource` {`string`} - Related Resource ID

  * `__toastText` {`string`} - 

  * `__toastColor` {`string`} - 

  * `__toastIcon` {`string`} - 

  * `randomize` {`boolean`} - Randomize the display of the answers

  * `hide-buttons` {`boolean`} - flag to hide buttons

  * `title` {`string`} - Title

  * `disabled` {`boolean`} - Support disabling interaction with the entire board

  * `single-option` {`boolean`} - Simple option, otherwise allow multiple via checkbox

  * `check-label` {`string`} - Text of the label to check your answer

  * `reset-label` {`string`} - Text of the reset button

  * `hide-title` {`boolean`} - Flag to hide the title

  * `question` {`string`} - Question to ask

  * `answers` {`any[]`} - Array of possible answers

  * `displayedAnswers` {`any[]`} - Displayed Answer set.

  * `correct-text` {`string`} - Correct answer text to display

  * `correct-icon` {`string`} - Correct answer text to display

  * `incorrect-text` {`string`} - Incorrect answer text to display

  * `incorrect-icon` {`string`} - Incorrect answer text to display

  * `quiz-name` {`string`} - Name of the quiz - hardcoded for now from HTML

Properties:

  * `positionTarget` - 

  * `relatedResource` {`string`} - Related Resource ID

  * `__toastText` {`string`} - 

  * `__toastColor` {`string`} - 

  * `__toastIcon` {`string`} - 

  * `randomize` {`boolean`} - Randomize the display of the answers

  * `hideButtons` {`boolean`} - flag to hide buttons

  * `title` {`string`} - Title

  * `disabled` {`boolean`} - Support disabling interaction with the entire board

  * `singleOption` {`boolean`} - Simple option, otherwise allow multiple via checkbox

  * `checkLabel` {`string`} - Text of the label to check your answer

  * `resetLabel` {`string`} - Text of the reset button

  * `hideTitle` {`boolean`} - Flag to hide the title

  * `question` {`string`} - Question to ask

  * `answers` {`any[]`} - Array of possible answers

  * `displayedAnswers` {`any[]`} - Displayed Answer set.

  * `correctText` {`string`} - Correct answer text to display

  * `correctIcon` {`string`} - Correct answer text to display

  * `incorrectText` {`string`} - Incorrect answer text to display

  * `incorrectIcon` {`string`} - Incorrect answer text to display

  * `quizName` {`string`} - Name of the quiz - hardcoded for now from HTML

Default: icons:thumb-up

Default: Better luck next time!

Default: icons:thumb-down
